title: The Struggle
description: A Love Triangle of Unspeakable Horror... DamonDetermined to make Elena his queen of darkness, he'd kill his own brother to possess her. StefanDesperate for the power to destroy Damon, he succumbs to his thirst for human blood. ElenaIrresistibly drawn to both brothers, her choice will decide their fate. The terrifying story of two vampire brothers and the beautiful girl torn between them.
author: L.J. Smith
